headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  REIMANN, MADELEINE HELENE (NEE PRAETORIUS)

lead_paragraph: REIMANN--Madeleine Helene (nee Praetorius), passed away peacefully at her home in Georgia at age 99 on February 23, 2014. She is pre-deceased by her husband Bernard Otto Reimann, her daughter Jenny Reimann, her grandson SSgt. Alexander Reimann and her sisters Elisabeth and Annette Praetorius. Madeleine is survived by her sons Bernard, Peter, Robert and Eric and their families including seven granddaughters, four grandsons, six great-granddaughters and five great-grandsons. Madeleine will be lovingly remembered as an exceptional, very giving mother, a loving and supportive wife, an accomplished gourmet cook and a very talented gardener. A private memorial will be scheduled in the spring. Donations may be made to the Ovarian Cancer Research Fund in memory of Jenny Reimann.
